title: How much does 3 pounds of ground beef cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t buy it like that any more. Firstly, beef is minced, not ground, and secondly it’s sold by the kg. Assuming that you mean 3 avoirdupois pounds, that’s about 1.35 kg. A kg of minced beef costs about $12, so your’re looking at about $16.20. That’s round here, of course. Round where you are (where? you don’t say) it’s probably different. So why ask Quora? Your local butcher or supermarket will gladly give you pricing. Is this a serious question? I haven’t downvoted it, but I will downvote any further such question, and report it.

The only possible answer I can give is : 3 times the cost of 1 pound of beef. But I have recently been visiting a regional country and I have checked my records . 3pounds of beef (equivalent to 1.36kg) cost me 104.75 Botswana Pula. Is this information of value to you?
